text:
@JackPosobiec Bro the Wuhan virus isn't named after Wuhan. It's named after Corona. The city in Italy. 

You don't need to stretch facts to make your point. Still correct, albeit ignorant

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela
